feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
